AggOO::vs::AIConverter

AggOO::vs::AIConverter Class Reference

#include <aggoo_vs_ai_parser.h>

List of all members.

Static Public Member Functions

static void cmykToRgb (double c, double m, double y, double k, double *r, double *g, double *b)

Detailed Description

Some values in the .ai file will need to be converted in order to be used in AggOO. This class provides static methods to handle the conversions.

Member Function Documentation

void AggOO::vs::AIConverter::cmykToRgb ( double  c,
double  m,
double  y,
double  k,
double *  r,
double *  g,
double *  b 
) [static]

Converts CMYK to RGB, using the method used by the Adobe prolog in the case where the interpreter cannot use CMYK. This is defined as: r = 1 - min( 1, C + K ) g = 1 - min( 1, M + K ) b = 1 - min( 1, Y + K )
